survey_name: Employee Engagement in Hybrid Work Environments Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee engagement and satisfaction levels in hybrid work environments, identifying key factors that contribute to productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work remotely in a hybrid work arrangement?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single selection. Ensure options cover the full range of remote work frequencies.
